title: At Kherson direction Russian army shelled Kherson city and Burhunka, Tyahynka, Tokarivka, Dniprovske, Kizomys, Stanislav of K...
content: At Kherson direction Russian army shelled Kherson city and Burhunka, Tyahynka, Tokarivka, Dniprovske, Kizomys, Stanislav of Kherson region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
